mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon ( coupon_title, coupon_sale_price, coupon_type, coupon_start_date, coupon_end_date ) VALUES( #{coupon_title}, #{coupon_sale_price}, #{coupon_type}, #{coupon_start_date}, #{coupon_end_date} )
mapper.update: update coupon set coupon_code=#{coupon_code}, coupon_title=#{coupon_title}, coupon_sale_price=#{coupon_sale_price}, coupon_type=#{coupon_type}, coupon_start_date=#{coupon_start_date}, coupon_end_date=#{coupon_end_date} where coupon_code=#{coupon_code}
mapper.select:
select * from (select @rownum := @rownum+1 as rnum, coupon_code, coupon_title, coupon_sale_price, coupon_type, coupon_start_date, coupon_end_date from coupon, (select @rownum :=0)as rowcolum
where coupon_title like concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
where coupon_sale_price like concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
where coupon_type like concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') order by coupon_code desc) as rownum_table where rnum >=#{startRow} and rnum <=#{endRow}

select count(*) from coupon
